attributes.action: enforce tattoo/piercing equipment sales to be restricted
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: tattoo & piercing equipment is avaliable to anyone with money. we are calling for equipment to be policed so it can only be bought by those who have a current license. there are to many people who have equipment and shouldn't as they are causing harm and it is a serious health risk.tattooists and piercers have to conform to certain standards its not fair to make us conform but let anyone have equipment and cause us bad press by there mistakes. i'm calling to enforce that equipment can only be sold to licensed professionals after all its dangerous in the wrong hands. e-bay is the main culprit for cheap/bad equipment getting in the wrong hands.
